*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to the governor, October 11, 1827. Petition to establish a town.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*To his *person_mentioned*Excellency the Governor of the *location_mentioned*State of Coahuila and Texas*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* */p*.
*p**person_mentioned*Citizen Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned*, most respectfully represents to *person_mentioned*Your Excellency*/person_mentioned*, that he has been solicited by several of the *person_mentioned*inhabitants*/person_mentioned* of *location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned*, to settle some *person_mentioned*families */person_mentioned**location_mentioned*on the borders of the River Colorado*/location_mentioned*, at the place *location_mentioned*where that river is crossed by the road leading from Bexar to Nacogdoches*/location_mentioned*, in order to found a *location_mentioned*town*/location_mentioned*, *location_mentioned*at the above- mentioned crossing*/location_mentioned*, with a view not only to afford the necessary *location_mentioned*facilities */location_mentioned*to the *person_mentioned*travellers */person_mentioned*of that road, but also to penetrate with the new *location_mentioned*settlements*/location_mentioned*, further into the *location_mentioned*interior of the country, towards the *person_mentioned*Savage Tribes*/person_mentioned*, but as this *location_mentioned*road is the Northern boundary of the Colony*/location_mentioned**/location_mentioned*, I have already contracted, and as the best site for the settlement of the Town, is *location_mentioned*on the Eastern bank of the river Colorado*/location_mentioned*, *location_mentioned*above the said road*/location_mentioned*, and *location_mentioned*beyond the limits of any colonization contract*/location_mentioned*, I am unable to effect the *location_mentioned*settlement */location_mentioned*proposed, without entering into a new contract, with the *person_mentioned*Government*/person_mentioned*, for the purpose, and believing that the Settlement of said Town, will be highly beneficial affording *location_mentioned*facilities */location_mentioned*for travelling, and to the mails and *person_mentioned*Troops*/person_mentioned*, frequently passing from *location_mentioned*Bexar */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*Nacodoches*/location_mentioned*, and also prevent in some degree the incursions of the *person_mentioned*Indians*/person_mentioned*, who are continually harassing the *location_mentioned*neighborhoods of Bexar*/location_mentioned*,*location_mentioned* La Bahia*/location_mentioned*, and the new *location_mentioned*Settlements*/location_mentioned*, and infest the *location_mentioned*roads*/location_mentioned*, I have considered it my duty, in order to promote the welfare and progress of *location_mentioned*that section of the State*/location_mentioned*, to lay the matter before your *person_mentioned*Excellency*/person_mentioned*, and recommend the establishment of the before-mentioned *location_mentioned*town*/location_mentioned*, offering on my part, to discharge all the duties of *person_mentioned*Empresario*/person_mentioned*, in effecting the same, and to settle *location_mentioned*in the vicinity of the town proposed,*/location_mentioned* the *location_mentioned*lands which may not be within the limits of any Colonization Contract*/location_mentioned*; provided the favors and privileges allowed to *person_mentioned*Empresarios */person_mentioned*are granted to me, and also that one of the stipulations of the Contract is, that each *person_mentioned*Colonist */person_mentioned*is to pay the sum of Thirty Dollars, for my services, in attending to their business, and making the translations to the completion of the title to their lands, by the *person_mentioned*Commissioner */person_mentioned* guaranteeing the contracts made between the *person_mentioned*Colonists */person_mentioned*and myself, I offer to settle *person_mentioned*One hundred families*/person_mentioned* in this *location_mentioned*new Colony,*/location_mentioned* but upon the conditions, that should there not be a sufficiency of land, within the limits assigned for the said *location_mentioned*new colony*/location_mentioned*, to locate them in conformity with the law in the case; Your Excellency will permit me to complete to them the quantity deficient, within the limits of the *location_mentioned*colony*/location_mentioned* which I have already contracted with the *person_mentioned*Government */person_mentioned*of this *location_mentioned*State*/location_mentioned**/p*
